name: World in fire
description:
No boy has never had a superhero dream, now it's your turn to save the human world.

An unknown monster suddenly appears above the city, and you transform into a superhero. Put on your weapon and launch an attack on the monster.

Operation method: Use the arrow keys to move characters, and use the left mouse button to launch weapons.

Game features:

The enemy is fiercely attacking, you need to constantly adjust your position and find the right time to attack them. Let's give it a try and see if you can successfully eliminate all monsters.

Nervous battles, stirring your heartstrings!

The stimulating mode keeps you addicted.
